title: i cant redeem my code
body:
i cant redeem my code gift it tells me that message when i try " there was a problem fulfilling your store items plz try again "
and i keep trying but not working 
help me plz

replies.body: If this is still happening, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help.  If it's a card you may need to get a screenshot handy, otherwise we'll reply back as soon as we can and help!
